Why Honeygirls ?

For a little backstory, we had to choose a name for our group during this week. We were struggling to come up with one until the last moment when we thought about using the initials of our names: Maeva, Ikrame, Emma, Lison. Coincidentally, it spelled "Miel" in French, which translates to "Honey" in English. Given that we are the only team entirely made up of girls on our campus so we decided to add "Girls" to our name. And that's how we became the Honeygirls!
